        Returns the products of the system

      • getProduct

        Product getProduct​(int id)
        Returns a product searched by the id
        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the product that we are looking for
        Returns:
        the product retrieved from the database

      • createProduct

        Product createProduct​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String partNo,
                      double price,
                      int stock,
                      int fabricId)
        Creates a product in the system
        Parameters:
        name - this is the name of the product we want to create
        description - this is the description of the product we want to create
        partNo - this is the partNo of the product we want to create
        price - this is the price of the product we want to create
        stock - this is the stock of the product we want to create
        fabricId - this is the fabricId of the product we want to create
        Returns:
        the created product

        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the product that we want to update
        vehicleId - this id of the vehicle we want to assign
        Returns:
        the updated product

      • deleteProduct

        boolean deleteProduct​(int id)
        Deletes a product
        Parameters:
        id - this is the id of the product that we are deleting
        Returns:
